author: Neil Strawson and Richard Hunt
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Preheat the oven to 170C/325F/Gas 3. Use a 7cm/2Â¾in cookie cutter to cut six small circles out of the wrap and place on a baking tray. Spoon a teaspoon of passata onto each circle and spread it to the edge. Sprinkle over some toppings and top with some grated cheese. Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and golden-brown.
ingredients: 1 large white tortilla flatbread,  30g/1oz tomato passata,  Selection of toppings such as fresh basil, sliced peppers and shredded cooked chicken,  30g/1oz mature cheddar, grated
